examples.step: Given User login with "<userId>" and "<password>" successfully
And User want to create new customer
When User input "<name>" and "<gender>" and "<dob>" and "<address>" and "<citi>" and "<state>" and "<pin>" and "<mobile>" and "<email>" and "<pass>" and submit
Then New customer is created
examples.example: {userId=mngr91821, password=udaneqE, name=Duong, gender=male, dob=12/04/1988, address=2 Ngo Duc Ke, citi=HCM, state=VN, pin=123456, mobile=0902646433, email=duong_vu161@yahoo.com, pass=123456, tag=component:UI}
examples.step: Given User login with "mngr91821" and "udaneqE" successfully
And User want to create new customer
When User input "Duong" and "male" and "12/04/1988" and "2 Ngo Duc Ke" and "HCM" and "VN" and "123456" and "0902646433" and "duong_vu161@yahoo.com" and "123456" and submit
Then New customer is created
